about

Welcome to King Code, your digital creative solution.

King Code is an online marketing agency in Phuket providing online marketing services to businesses in Thailand, The USA, UK, Laos, Australia, South Africa, Zanzibar and all the countries in between.

King Code is a team of skilled professionals offering an interconnected set of services to help our clients seize the opportunities of this digital age.
We are your full-service digital marketing company specialising in website development, social media marketing, photography and videography.

We offer fully optimised and user-journey focused custom-coded websites that are fast, secure and fully responsive on all devices. We are all about the journey leading to conversions, viewers into clients, and social media followers into raving fans. Our social media marketing, is managed by our experts in organic social media who have grown accounts from 0 fans to over 2 million fans within one year through viral photography & videography. Our content is constantly ahead of current trends making impactful statements that will place you in the perfect position to convert social media engagement into online sales.

To reach your full potential, contact us for a free consultation.
